caption: Merge One PDF and a List of PDFs using
doc: Merge one PDF and a list of PDFs together.

ABT.caption: This action allows you to merge a single PDF with a list of PDFs. The single PDF will be placed before the list of PDFs.
ABT.name: info

ABV.caption: This is designed to be used when you need to place a single PDF (such as a cover-sheet or static PDF) before a list of PDFs.
ABV.name: info2

ABW.caption: Filename
ABW.doc: Name to give your file WITHOUT THE .PDF EXTENSION.
ABW.name: filename

ACA.caption: Use base64 Strings
ACA.doc: Use this checkbox if you want to pass base64 strings (instead of file URLs) to the PDF Merger; this option allows for direct-download of files without needing to save to the database.
ACA.name: use_base64_strings

ACC.caption: Direct Download
ACC.doc: Use this checkbox to trigger a download of the merged file once the merging has completed.
ACC.name: direct_download

ACE.caption: Do Not Upload to Database
ACE.doc: Use this checkbox to stop the PDF Merger from uploading the file to your database.
ACE.name: do_not_upload_to_database
